profile:
Helping home owners with their exterior restoration, and giving the best long lasting finished product that they can be proud of! 

Masonry restoration services include: 

- Chimney rebuilds
- Brick, block, stone installations
- Parging
- Tuckpointing
- Windows / Doors enclosures and openings
- Limestone sill installations
and more!

Feel free to send us any information such as photos, measurements and etc that will be helpful to obtaining a free quote.

[E-mail] info@tlmasonry.org
[Mobile] 647-646-3043
[Office] 647-403-5472
name: TL Masonry

profile: We are now retired.  Fishing our days away.  Thanks all for being great customers!
service_area: Toronto to Barrie and Scarboro to Oakville
products: We sell high quality pest screens/rain caps.
services:
Everything from large rebuilds to small repairs...we do it all!
If you need a pest screen, a cleaning, bricks repaired, window sills or even brickwork around the house, we have you covered.

profile: Founders,  Jesse & Garth  Dinan of Chameleon Masonry Restoration have over 15 years of restoration experience.  Our company is based out of Barrie, Ontario with satisfied  customers in the Barrie, Innisfil, Alliston, Bradford, Newmarket, Aurora and Richmond Hill. We are able to meet the unique requirements of home owners, contractors and property management companies in residential, commercial and industrial masonry restoration activities.
